All Implemented Interfaces:
ByteSized, Readable, Writable, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, StringSource, ChangedAt, Modifiable, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, ResourcePathed, ReadableResource, Resource, Resourceful, UriIdentified, WritableResource
public class OutputResource extends BaseWritableResource
An OutputStream stream wrapper that turns the output stream into a WritableResource.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • isWritable

      public Boolean isWritable()
      Returns:
      True if this write-openable object can be written to, false if it cannot and null if it cannot be determined if this object can be written to.
